headers.subject: [tosdr:2970] Yammer.com (Microsoft Enterprise Social Network solution)

html:
https://about.yammer.com/terms/

https://about.yammer.com/privacy/
Also available other language

https://about.yammer.com/service-terms/

I am brand new this group; and I will try to understand what I can do for contributing. But I do not understand yet, if I should gives my opinions or not about the EULA, regarding criterias was defined under ToSDR ?
Not sure I am able to provide a clever point of view about...
Best regards.

--
